amendment.description: Amendment adds a short title and clarifies the nature of prohibited Iranian transactions. Also, the amendment provides for a sunset of the bill's provisions upon Presidential certification that Iran has ceased support for international terrorism.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huizenga (MI) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A002) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Huizenga (MI) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Huizenga (MI) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Huizenga (MI).
